allow:
Bash(ruby -e '
require ""xcodeproj""

project_path = ""Health Reporter.xcodeproj""
project = Xcodeproj::Project.open\(project_path\)

# Find Watch App target
watch_target = project.targets.find { |t| t.name == ""Health Reporter Watch App Watch App"" }
if watch_target.nil?
  puts ""Watch target not found!""
  exit 1
end

# Find the Watch App group
watch_group = project.main_group.find_subpath\(""Health Reporter Watch App Watch App"", true\)

# Add the new file
file_path = ""Health Reporter Watch App Watch App/ScoreBreakdownView.swift""
file_ref = watch_group.new_reference\(file_path\)
watch_target.source_build_phase.add_file_reference\(file_ref\)

project.save
puts ""Added ScoreBreakdownView.swift to Watch App target""
')
